content: A `Select` displays a collapsible list of options. It is composed of `Select`, `SelectItem`, and `SelectSection`. It supports both static and dynamic collections of items.
You can allow single selection (default) or multiple selection by setting `selectionMode="multiple"`. Use `onSelectionChange` or `onChange` to handle value changes.
Key features include disabled items (`disabledKeys`), `startContent`/`endContent`, item descriptions, and a clear button (`isClearable`). The displayed value can be customized with `renderValue`.
For large datasets, `Select` supports asynchronous loading of items and virtualization (`isVirtualized`) for improved performance.
You can control the selected items via the `selectedKeys` prop and the open state of the popover via the `isOpen` prop.
